name: Farm
description: +1 Food +0.5 Housing. +1 Food with two adjacent Farms (Req. Feudalism) +1 Food for each adjacent Farm (Req. Replaceable Parts)

name: Mine
description: -1 Appeal +1 Production +1 Production (Req. Apprenticeship). +1  Production (Req. Industrialization). +1 Production (Req. Smart Materials)

name: Quarry
description: -1 Appeal +1  Production +2  Gold (Req. Banking) (Vanilla and R&F only) +1  Production (Req. Rocketry) +1  Production (Req. Gunpowder) +1  Production (Req. Predictive Systems)

name: Plantation
description: +2  Gold +0.5  Housing +1  Food (Req. Scientific Theory) +2  Gold (Req. Globalization)

name: Camp
description: +2  Gold +0.5  Housing +1  Food (Req. Mercantilism) +1  Production (Req. Mercantilism) +1  Gold (Req. Synthetic Materials)

name: Pasture
description: +1  Production +0.5  Housing +1 Food (Req. Stirrups) +1  Production (Req. Robotics)

name: Fishing Boats
description: +1  Food +0.5 Housing +2 Gold (Req. Cartography) +1 Food (Req. Plastics)

name: Lumber Mill
description: Vanilla and R&F +1 Production +1 Production if adjacent to a River +1 Production (Req. Steel) +2 Production +1 Production (Req. Steel) +1 Production (Req. Cybernetics)

name: Fort
description: Occupying unit receives +4 Defense Strength and 2 turns of fortification. Built by a Military Engineer.

name: Airstrip
description: -1 Appeal +3 Aircraft Capacity Built by a Military Engineer.

name: Seaside Resort
description: Provides the tile's Appeal in Tourism. Provides the tile's Appeal in Gold.

name: Geothermal Plant
description: +2 Production +1 Science +4 Power

name: Wind Farm
description: +1  Production +1 Gold +2 Power

name: Solar Farm
description: +1 Production +1 Gold +2 Power

name: Offshore Wind Farm
description: +1 Production +1 Gold +2 Power

name: Ski Resort
description: +1 Amenity Provides Tourism equal to the tile's Appeal. Cannot be built next to another Ski Resort.

name: Oil Well
description: -1 Appeal +2 Production

name: Offshore Oil Rig
description: -1 Appeal +2 Production

name: Missile Silo
description: Acts as launch site for Nuclear and Thermonuclear Devices. Built by a Military Engineer.

name: Mountain Tunnel
description: Allows units to move into it and exit through another Mountain Tunnel at the cost of 2 Movement. Built by a Military Engineer. Cannot be pillaged or removed.

name: Railroad
description: 0.25 Movement Built by a Military Engineer.

name: Seastead
description: +2 Food +1 Production from each adjacent Fishing Boat. Fishing Boats receive +1  Production from each adjacent Seastead. +1 Culture and Tourism for each adjacent Reef. +2 Housing
